page.title: 07FARMING CUCKFIELD RURAL
page.content: The farms in this area vary in size, crops and stock.Great Bently has the best arable land growing wheat and barley.This year peas for freezing were grown to contract.Despite an unusually wet summer,they were har- vested successfully,but will not be grown again,due to marketing problems. Field beans were grown on Tyes farm (worked with Biggs farm)they are con- tracted,sown one autumn and harvested by the contractors the next.They are then milled into high protein cattle feed.At present field beans give a better return per acre than corn, and form part of a crop rotation. Potatoes wheat,oilseed rape,barley and peas for animal feed were grown on Upper and Lower Sparks farm,the peas were a total loss,as they are harvested late and the prolonged wet summer spoiled them.
